Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Grand Estates Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Columbia Crest’s 2,500 acres of estate vineyards are some of the best in Washington. With only six to eight inches of annual rainfall, water to the Columbia Crest vineyards is supplied by drip irrigation, allowing control over the timing and quantity of water delivered to the vines and yielding grapes with well-balanced characteristics. In addition to the winemaking team's commitment to quality, Columbia Crest is also dedicated to producing approachable wines that people will enjoy. Our heritage of winemaking excellence is applied to every bottle—we strive to produce wines that are balanced, rich in flavor, and surpass expectations.

Name: Le Volte
Wine Description: Intense ruby red in color, the nose has lively notes of red fruits and rose petals; in the mouth it is full and enveloping, characterized by a dense tannic texture and a vibrant acidity that make it a wine of great pleasure and drinkability.

Name: Tempranillo
Wine Description: It is rich aromas have a pronounced intensity with an initial scent of ripe red fruit followed by gentle sweet notes of vanilla and spices. On the palate it is perfumed, soft and fresh with a long finish that leaves memories of red fruit, vanilla and cocoa.

Name: Graves
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: In the wine glass it presents a clean, bright cherry color with a garnet edge. On the nose it maintains the freshness of the fruit, with notes of vanilla and the most emblematic aromas of toasted oak. On the palate it is silky and persistent presenting a taste of well blended spice.

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: A deep, dark red-colored wine with ripe cherry and plum fruit aromas and a hint of light vanilla oak. Plum, raspberry jam, and tea leaves predominate the palate. The wine has a balanced roundness and supple tannins with lingering fruit on the finish.

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: Bursting with concentrated blueberry and spice flavors. Tannins present along with a touch of smoke. Full body, taste of spice and fruit.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: It has shining ruby red. Intense aroma of red fruit, mixed with soft spicy tones. Full body, with intense fruit, soft tannins with a long finish.

Name: Red Blend
Wine Description: Deep, ruby red color with ripe cherry and a touch of cocoa on the nose. Juicy red fruits continue on the palate and combine with notes of raspberry jam and black tea. Soft and smooth with lingering notes of plum on the finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: An intense, deeply colored wine of concentrated aromas and flavors. The wine is approachable and delicious. Full of dark cherries and black currants and has notes of cedar, sandalwood and coffee.

Name: Sassoalloro
Wine Description: It has deep ruby coloured, the nose is fresh and fruity, with red cherry and spice. The palate is medium bodied and elegant, with lots of summer fruit flavours and a sweet/sour note. The finish has well integrated tannins.

Name: Castel del Monte Trentangeli Rosso
Wine Description: Colour: Intense ruby red. Aroma: Red fruits, marasca cherry, licorice, spicy notes. Taste: Warm, rich with great structure and persistence. The aging in barrique endows the wine with length and elegance.

Name: Le Petit Lion Saint-Julien
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Carmenere (Reserva)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Finca Resalso
Wine Description: It has cherry red color of good intensity and a rim with blue tones . Clear, honest aromas with a predominance of red fruits, mulberry and blackberry. A very subtle background of oak and earthy minerals. On the palate it is structured and balanced with a long pleasant finish.

Name: Double Down Red Blend
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: Intense black-cherry colour and hardly any signs of evolution. Expressive aromas on the nose with notes of liquorice, cinnamon, black pepper and fruit. On the palate, good backbone and lovely, polished tannins. Persistent finish.

Name: Nero di Lupo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rèmole Rosso
Wine Description: Remole 2013 is a purple-red color, bright and intense. The nose offers fruity notes of raspberry and blackberry, followed by spicy hints of black pepper and anise. The finish is delicately balsamic with eucalyptus and mint. Once again, this latest vintage confirms Remole as an elegant wine with lovely fullness and long persistence.

Name: Côtes-du-Rhône-Villages 'Plan de Dieu'
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Trinch!
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tres Ojos Garnacha
Wine Description: It has hint of rubber and asphalt, the bouquet on this value wine is generous and topped with blackberry and dark plum aromas. The palate is grabby, with clampy tannins and black-fruit flavors mixed with chocolate and spice. The earthy, lightly herbal finish with rubbery nuances is nice.

Name: Crianza
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Aromas of rich, dark fruit and baking spices on the nose yielding to fresh plum, blackberry, violet, dried fig, vanilla bean and Chinese five-spice. The wine is juicy with plum and blackberry flavours, prominently layered with smoky and sappy maple oak, roasted almonds and hazelnuts. It finishes long with fine, firm tannins. Josh Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon is a notable wine from California's North Coast region, and it holds a special place in the hearts of wine enthusiasts for its rich flavors, approachable style, and homage to a father's legacy. This wine is a part of the Josh Cellars collection, created by Joseph Carr, who named the brand as a tribute to his father, Josh Carr. Joseph Carr's vision was to craft wines that are both accessible and of high quality, and Josh Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon embodies this vision beautifully. Here's a closer look at this remarkable wine: History: The story of Josh Cellars began in 2007 when Joseph Carr decided to honor his father's memory by creating a line of wines that celebrate life's moments. The wines have since gained recognition and popularity for their affordability and consistent quality. Grapes: This Cabernet Sauvignon is predominantly made from the Cabernet Sauvignon grape variety. Known for its deep color and robust flavors, Cabernet Sauvignon is a staple in the world of red wines. Winemaking: The winemaking process for Josh Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon involves careful grape selection and fermentation in stainless steel tanks. The wine is then aged in a combination of French and American oak barrels, which imparts complexity and depth to the final product. Taste Profile: Josh Cellars Cabernet Sauvignon is characterized by its rich, dark fruit flavors, including notes of black cherry and blackberry. Subtle hints of oak, vanilla, and a touch of spice add complexity. It offers a medium to full-bodied experience with a smooth, approachable mouthfeel.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Alamos Malbec has a dark purple colour with violet highlight. The nose offers bright black cherry aromas with light floral notes and a touch of toast. The mouthfeel is a full and rich, with ripe, concentrated cassis and black cherry fruit interwoven with a touch of chocolate and sweet spice from light oak raging. The finish shows ripe, silky tannins.

Name: Reserva
Wine Description: It has a fresh mouth-feel, almost giving the impression of having mentholated nuances, with a presence of acidic fruit liqueur. It can seem quite a strange combination. In the retronasal phase it is totally spicy and leaves new hints of liqueur fruit at a second level, but this time much more complex in character.

Name: Sonoma Coast Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Aromas of red cherry, raspberry, pomegranate and sweet tobacco. Multi-layered flavors of red, blue and black berry fruit, plums, cherries and a hint of blood orange underpin subtle layers of exotic spice and toast. Fine tannins and balanced acidity drive a long finish.

Name: Tonel 46 Reserva Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Armé (Estate Grown)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It contains exhibits charming aromas of bright red fruits, with baking spices and underbrush. The nose is bright and high toned - very expressive. Medium bodied on the palate with a darker fruit profile, the wine is sleek and silky in texture. Additional notes of black mission figs and plums emerge, with some anise, black pepper and a little forest floor note. In the finish, the wine reveals clove and hints of espresso. Soft, youthful tannins are nicely balanced with acidity, and the wine is quite seamless.

Name: Colección de Parcelas
Wine Description: Cherry red, slightly orange, clean, bright and high density. Powerful, dry taste, pleasant tannins, long-lived, woody and spicy aftertaste, light animal presence easy drinking, good acidity. Intense, ripe fruit, balanced touch of oak, presents hints of spice rosemary and basil.

Name: Selección Especial (Reserva)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: I Vasari Old Vines Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Misión Tinto
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Villa Antinori Rosso
Wine Description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Il Vino dal Tralcetto Montepulciano d'Abruzzo
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Dark violet color with deep bluish – black tones. The nose offers ripe, concentrated dark fruit aromas with delicate floral notes and traces of vanilla and mocha. The mouthfeel is rich and lush, with concentrated black cherry and red currant fruit flavors layered with sweet spices, tobacco and a touch of leather.

Name: Côtes-du-Rhône Rouge
Wine Description: Deep and dark red. Shiny. Fresh fruits with red berries and spices. Full, round and racy. Rounded and smooth tannins. A full-bodied, rich and intensly aromatic wine. Full with a long finish and plenty of elegance and finesse due to the well balanced tannins and fruit.

Name: Shebang
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Montes Alpha Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep ruby red color, the expression of cabernet sauvignon is evident providing structure and elegance. Lots of berries fruits and hints of tobacco and vanilla. Promising abundant soft rounded tannins.

Name: Clos de Torribas Crianza Tempranillo
Wine Description: Brilliant dark red colour with touches of ochre. The oak stands out coupled with intense spice. If we swirl the wine in the glass, we get aromas which are typical of the variety as well as fruits of the forest. A gentle palate with moderate ageing. The oak is well balanced to maintain the wine’s freshness. Touches of cedar and oak. As the wine ages, smooth tannins come out in the retro nasal stage.

Name: Unshackled Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Alta Shiraz - Malbec
Wine Description: It displays a deep red colour with lively bluish hues and Malbec typical intensity. In the nose, there are aromas reminiscent of spiced notes granted by Syrah, combined with all the range of red fruit characteristic of Malbec

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Affinity
Wine Description: It has dark red plums, tobacco and spices blossom in a supple, radiant wine. … The flavors brighten up through the mid-palate and finish, adding energy and polish.”

Name: Cà Bertoldi Amarone della Valpolicella Classico
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Gran Selección Malbec
Wine Description: Dense flavors of dark plum and chocolate, layered with toasted oak and a velvety finish that lingers and lingers.

Name: Nero d'Avola
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Ultreia Saint Jacques Mencía
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Monastrell
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The bouquet and front palate is intense with notes of baked red cherries, ripe boysenberries, spicy cinnamon, and mild clove with floral hints of violets. The medium body bridges the middle to a toasty but unobtrusive back palate infused with vanilla and light mocha that finishes cleanly without dropping off abruptly, or lingering too long.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: This elegant and mediumbodied wine has delicate aromas of violet and rose petals, complex flavors and long silky textures, with layers of strawberry and raspberry leading into a long refined finish.

Name: Sangiovese Umbria
Wine Description: It has a lively freshness, with hints of plum, red rose, fruits of blackberry, white pepper. The slight aging never dampens quite some tannin that gives the wine a tone never yielding. Great side of noodles with meat sauce, diced beef, grilled meat.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon (Reserva)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Pèppoli Chianti Classico
Wine Description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

Name: Avni Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: It has aromas of cherry and plum with a hint of violet float from the glass and continue to the palate, where they are joined by pronounced notes of toasty oak, vanilla and hints of mocha. Rich and plush in the mouth

Name: Viña Alberdi Reserva
Wine Description: Bright cherry red, with a medium robe and clear pink tones on the edge of the glass. Good aromatic intensity, fresh with fruity hints of raspberry and wild strawberry. Well structured and balanced to the palate, with silky smooth tannins and a vibrant, joyful acidity.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It is a juicy wine displaying bright red fruit flavours with sweet notes of vanilla and spice. The wine has a soft finish.

Name: Rosso di Montalcino
Wine Description: It is velvety and well balanced, medium-bodied crisp and fruity and long lingering.

Name: Pinot Noir Finca La Papay
Wine Description: Bright red color. Red fruit stands out, strawberries and ripe plums. On the palate, it is fruity with hints of spices and vanilla contributed by the wood. Smooth and elegant wine.

Name: Old Vine Zinfandel
Wine Description: These gnarly old vines produce concentrated fruit of unsurpassed quality and intensity. This supple and full-bodied vintage begins with brambleberries and raspberry jam. Summertime ripeness and richness integrate with hints of black pepper and a touch of dark chocolate. The finish of toasty oak, tobacco and spicy cloves creates a wine of both structure and sumptuousness.

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Russian River Valley Pinot Noir
Wine Description: It has inviting aromas of Bing cherry, raspberry, vanilla and pie spice. It has bright flavors of cherry, raspberry and red currant swirl around hints of forest floor, cinnamon and clove. A lovely, bright acidity, perfectly balanced by velvety tannins leading to a long, persistent finish.

Name: Two Messengers Pinot Noir
Wine Description: The wine opens with fresh red fruits aromas, light floral accents and notes of Asian spices. The palate is mouth-filling and lush with juicy primary fruit such as cherry and pomegranate balanced with an earthy complexity. Vibrant acidity and supple tannins support the flavors through a long, satisfying finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Celebrated by the Vivino community as ‘bold yet smooth; rich and complex’, ‘very well balanced’ and ‘wonderful on the first sip’, this Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon demands attention. The vibrant, oaky and earthy Napa Valley Cabernet Sauvignon, with subtle black fruit undertones, is reassuringly bold and velvety, and for this reason, has earned its place as one of the Vivino community’s favourite Cabernet Sauvignons. One Vivino member even commented, ‘Just wow! An explosion of different flavors’, and another admitted that they were ‘not sure how much better you can get for any price’. With origins in the renowned Caymus Vineyards, the famous winemaking region’s unique heritage can be tasted with each drop. In 1972, Chuck Wagner and his late parents, Lorna and Charlie Sr., opened Caymus Vineyards, starting off with 240 cases of Cabernet Sauvignon. Over half a century later, Caymus Vineyards in Napa Valley remains 100% family-owned and run, and uses many of the same winemaking techniques of generations before. If you’re looking for a specific year to try first, Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2019 vintage is ranked 93 by wine professional, Wilfred Wong. However, Caymus Vineyards Cabernet Sauvignon 2020 and 2018 vintages are both in high demand across the U.S. and beyond. Pair any of these vintages with beef, lamb, game, poultry or a cheese board for a dinner party match made in heaven. Bon appétit!

Name: Tenuta Guado al Tasso Il Bruciato Bolgheri
Wine Description: Marchesi Antinori’s passion for viticulture is expressed through perseverance: their continuous pursuit for quality improvement, even in the smallest details. Research and development is an ongoing process both in the vineyards and in the cellars: selecting new clones of local and international varieties: experimenting with new techniques in the vineyards and vineyard altitudes, new approaches to fermentation and temperature control, experimenting with both traditional and innovative winemaking philosophies, using new types of oak for barrels, barrel size and age, and varying length of aging in the bottle before commercial release.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon (Diamond Dust Vineyard)
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tres Picos Garnacha
Wine Description: Deep and sweet, Tres Picos Borsao is cherry red in colour with a hint of purple tones. In the nose, there is a boundless bouquet of mature red fruits with traces of flowers that are typical of the best Garnachas.

Name: Family Reserve Generations
Wine Description: Spice, cocoa and mineral aromas provide an entry to the expansive palate of blackberry, black and red currant with firm tannins and a soft, velvety finish.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The wine is rich cherry, dark berry and cassis flavors, adding subtle nuances of toasted vanilla and toffee.

Name: Glou Glou
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Le Trame Toscana
Wine Description: Trame bursts with succulent red and blue fruit, fresh-cut herbs, sun-warmed earth, crushed roses and brooding mocha, notes that perfume this medium-bodied wine’s mid-palate. Vibrant and lively, the wine frames its juicy fruit with spices and pepper, and it balances its bright acidity.

Name: Lucente
Wine Description: The nose is just as impressive, presenting a broad range of elegant aromatic impressions. Smooth, ripe scents of dried plum and blackberry preserves are easily noted, along with more pungent roasted espresso bean and baker’s chocolate, and subtle notes of green pepper.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: A soft entry, with ripe plum and raspberry in the forefront, is supported by background flavors of tobacco and caramel, which add complexity to this imminently drinkable wine.

Name: Shiraz
Wine Description: Full depth crimson with purple hues. Ripe cherry and dark berry with dried herb and spice. Ripe blackberry and plum with attractive mid-palate fruit sweetness. Medium bodied, with soft velvety tannins and subtle toasty oak.

Name: Coto de Imaz Rioja Reserva
Wine Description: Brick-cherry red colour. Aroma with slight hints of oak standing out over the ripe fruit. Tasty an tannic.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Merlot
Wine Description: Blackberry aromas surround a bouquet of cream and a hint of baking spices.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The Burgess Cellars’ hillside vineyards are on the steep slopes of Howell Mountain. The various exposures result in grapes that complement one another and build a complex, delicious wine. Soils range from volcanic ash to rocky marine sediments, this, combined with mature vines and skilled wine making give us a complex and elegant wine.

Name: Felino Malbec
Wine Description: Aromas of violet flower, dulce de leche and shortbread. On the palate, it carries vibrant flavors of blueberry, boysenberry, violet jam and a precise note of black cherry pie, with chewy, ripe tannins.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: Deep and youthful colour. The nose is a mix of ripe dark fruits, blackcurrant, sandalwood and violets. Rich and mouth coating with notable tannins, yet beautifully integrated.

Name: Estates Seven Oaks Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: The wine is red-purple in color with a bright hue at release. Fruit aromas are black cherry, plum and blueberry accented with a barrel bouquet of toasted pastry, dark caramel and vanilla. Sturdy tannins strike the palate and finish with the high-toned fruit signature typical of the Paso Robles appellation. High-toned Paso Robles Cabernet with a lovely bouquet of toasted pastry and vanilla.

Name: Moulin de Duhart Pauillac
Wine Description: Beautiful garnet-red colour. On the palate the wine is supple, round and flavoursome with a good structure.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: In this wine cherry fruit is lifted with highlights of hot pepper candy. A slightly smoky, slightly burnt character marks the finishing tannins.

Name: Zinfandel
Wine Description: Blackberry jam and black cherry with notes of vanilla caramel and cola. Hints of spice emerge on a finely structured finish.

Name: Chianti
Wine Description: Rich with notes of ripen red fruit and light toasty notes. Fruity and well balanced, with elegant and long aftertaste.

Name: Tinto
Wine Description: Very bright, deep and clean violet color; blackberry and licorice aromas in the nose; long-lasting, powerful and smooth taste in mouth.

Name: Post Flirtation Red
Wine Description: Showcases all of the raspberry, hibiscus, and rhubarb zing that these two grapes can exhibit when picked on the fresher side. This is the perfect chillable red you’ll be grabbing for as the weather starts warming up.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon Reserva
Wine Description: Fresh and intense fruit with notes of black cherry, red fruit and hints of smoke. Good structure and volume in the mouth, with round tannins.

Name: Chianti Classico Riserva
Wine Description: Deep, rich and fleshy, this vintage captures the sense of this radiant, expressive vintage.

Name: Pinot Noir
Wine Description: Bright ruby color, this wine offers intense floral and raspberry aromas. In the mouth the wine has a good intensity with darker earth flavors and bright raspberry fruit. Fine tannins add structure and balance to a long finish.

Name: Gattinara
Wine Description: Deep garnet color, the nose shows delicate spicy, dominated by a clear and strong minerality; nice solid structure

Name: Terroir Series Pinot Noir
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Tinto Reserva
Wine Description: Structured, this oozes blackberry fruitiness as well as a balanced layer of dry tannins. The wine is fruity and rich while keeping its elegance. A core of tannins and fresh acidity in the fruit promise that this wine will age.

Name: Côte de Brouilly
Wine Description: Red color with bluish reflections, discreet perfume of violet and peony. In the mouth it is necessary with a nice balance of soft tannins and small wild red fruits such as strawberry or blueberry. The finish is long and peppery.

Name: PSI
Wine Description: This wine is dense and silky, red in colour with aromas of blueberry, cherry and stone. Limestone, chalky mouthfeel. Full and chewy, it has a very long finish.

Name: Vino Nobile di Montepulciano
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Malbec
Wine Description: Deep, dark purple-red color leading to a bouquet of fresh red fruits folded with coffee notes. The palate is highlighted by mouth-filling black cherry and dark plum flavors, elegantly wrapped with subtle spice and velvety, gentle tannins.

Name: Chianti Classico
Wine Description: The original formula of the famous Italian, maintaining the beautiful red ruby typical of Sangioveto. A wine that wants to reach, with its uniqueness, the maximum of elegance.

Name: Meandro Douro Tinto
Wine Description: Dark, rich, red colour with grapey-blueberry-blackberry nose. Gargantuan blueberry and black currant/cassis flavours. Red fruits blend with a meaty mid-palate, light oak and loads of acidity. Black pepper underneath and wonderful minerality.

Name: Cabernet Sauvignon
Wine Description: N/A

Name: Rioja Reserva
Wine Description: N/A
